column4: Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
You know, a birth control pill.
…It's a pill that makes sure you don't get pregnant.
…What the fuck? Something like that exists?
Yeah, I didn't. Why the fuck didn't you tell me?! We could have had so much raw sex!
I-I thought you knew, given it's part of our sex-ed curriculum…
W-Well, I know now, so whatever. Fork it over and we'll pretend this never happened.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: ….I mean, is there any other option to begin with? If I get pregnant that'll be that. I let you do it anyway…
No, well, I mean, there are birth control pills out there, so…
…......Yeah, alright, I'll admit it, I didn't. Why shouldn't I take one then?
Because I don't want you to.
…Well, I already prepared my heart for this since I didn't even know there was something like that.
So sure. As long as you take responsibility and help me raise the child, that'll be that.
